column4: I'm trying to create a repo for my DEB files but the server I have is RHEL.  Can anyone point me to a tutorial of how to create a deb repo on an RHEL sever?
you can use the launchpad PPA service
I need it to work with debian as well and keep track of download statistics
I already have DEB packages build on the openSuse-build service which I use for my RPMs for other distros as well
